newsitem.title: USA: IMP says cut 39 jobs due to soft demand.
newsitem.headline: IMP says cut 39 jobs due to soft demand.

text.p: IMP Inc said it further reduced its staff because of still-soft product demand.
The company said it cut 39 employees, about 14 percent of its work force.
As previously reported, company revenues for the fourth fiscal quarter, and for the foreseeable future, will fall significantly below those reported for the third fiscal quarter.
